<b> Commercial Starcraft 2 Strats </b>

The Economic Starcraft II Zerg strategies is in addition very different from Terran and also Protoss. When playing as Terran or as Protoss probably the most significance and important thing may be to have as many mineral patches as you can. While playing as Zerg the more important thing is may be Hatcheries you have!

The difference between Terran and Protoss one side and Zerg to the the other is the fact that Terran and Protoss make their workers at a linear rate. BUT, with the Zerg your sincerity have enough Larvae you can train multiple Drones simultaneously, as you know may be Larvae is affected by may be Hatcheries which makes the idea so important. A good rule of thumb is to have between 2-3 Hatcheries for any home base that the enemy (Protoss) offers.

You will need to have 5 Drones for just about every Hatchery, this number is an average not an overall! when training Zerglings you have to pick only 3 Drones to take root minerals but so as to train some Mutas you require 5 of them on minerals and 3 on gas harvesting. So the average amount of 5 Drones is a good method to go.
